pages.text: Ever had trouble with constantly getting enchantments that you don't want from your enchanting table?$(br2)No problem! Simply $(4)right-click$() with the Tome of Refreshing on hand and the enchantments on the table will be rerolled.

The tome can be created by imbuing a Book of Shadows on an Altar of Souls.$(br2)It also allows you to disenchant items in exchange for more charges and experience. You may do so by adding it alongside the enchanted item on the crafting grid.
